attributes.action: Extend VAT relief on vehicles for disabled people to ALL disabilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there is an exemption on paying VAT on vehicles when they are permanently adapted for a wheelchair user. I move to extend this protection to ALL permanent adaptations to a vehicle, e.g. to adapt a vehicle to a driver with one arm, to fit a rotating seat to allow entry to the vehicle for a disabled person or to extend features for a person with short limbs.
